db_secret_arn.description: Secrets Manager secret ARN containing DB credentials

ecr_repository_url.description: ECR repository URL for the migrations image

ecs_task_definition_arn.description: ECS task definition ARN for migrations runner

runner_security_group_id.description: Security group ID to attach to migrations runner tasks

allowed_cidrs.description: CIDR blocks allowed to connect to the DB (only used if you set db_publicly_accessible=true).

az_count.description: Number of AZs to use (2 or 3).

db_deletion_protection.description: Enable deletion protection on the RDS instance.

db_multi_az.description: Whether to enable Multi-AZ for the RDS instance.

db_name.description: Initial database name to create in RDS.

db_publicly_accessible.description: Whether the DB should have a public endpoint. Keep false for private-only.

db_username.description: Master username for the RDS instance.

migrations_image_tag.description: ECR image tag for the migrations container.

tags.description: Tags to apply to all resources.
